com.eco.bio7.time

Class Time

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eco.bio7.time.Time

  • public class Time
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods to access the time and the counter of the Bio7 application.
    Author:
    Bio7

      • setMonth

        public static void setMonth(java.lang.String[] month)
        A method to rearrange the sequence of the month. This method has to be used with the setMonthnumber method!
        Parameters:
        month - the month values as a string array.

      • setMonthnumber

        public static void setMonthnumber(int[] month)
        A method which will change the sequence of the month as a number. This method has to be used with the setMonth method!
        Parameters:
        month - the sequence as an integer array.
